org.shared.cli

Annotation Type CliOptions.CliOption


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public static @interface CliOptions.CliOption
    An annotation for a single Option.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String argName
      The argument name.
      String description
      The Option description.
      boolean hasOptionalArgs
      Whether arguments are optional.
      String longOpt
      The long Option name.
      int nArgs
      The minimum number of arguments that can be expected.
      String opt
      The short Option name.
      boolean required
      Whether the Option is required.
      char valueSeparator
      The Option value separator.

    • Element Detail

      • opt

        public abstract String opt
        The short Option name.
        Default:
        ""

      • longOpt

        public abstract String longOpt
        The long Option name.
        Default:
        ""

      • hasOptionalArgs

        public abstract boolean hasOptionalArgs
        Whether arguments are optional.
        Default:
        false

      • nArgs

        public abstract int nArgs
        The minimum number of arguments that can be expected. Use -1 to denote an unlimited number.
        Default:
        1

      • required

        public abstract boolean required
        Whether the Option is required.
        Default:
        false

      • argName

        public abstract String argName
        The argument name.
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract String description
        The Option description.
        Default:
        ""

      • valueSeparator

        public abstract char valueSeparator
        The Option value separator.
        Default:
        0
